questions.questionTitle: Who are the speakers mainly discussing?
What can be inferred about John Crowther?
anwers: He knows the woman speaker well.
He was successful at Southwell Inc.

questions.questionTitle: What is true of the woman?
anwers: She has previously worked for John Crowther.
She once worked at Southwell Inc.
She thinks Mr. Crowther is easy going.

script:
� Mr. Crowther is coming to us from Southwell Inc. Didn't you used to work there?
� Yes, I did. I know John Crowther, but he wasn't my direct supervisor.
� Well, he must be good, with the results he got at Southwell. What did his employees think of him?
� From what I could tell, they liked working for him. They said he was tough but fair.
